name: Finnair A350 XWB - Business Class, HEL-LHR Trip Report
description:
I take Finnair's *brand new* A350 XWB aircraft on a test flight, from Helsinki to London, in Business Class. This is the first visit the Finnair A350 has made to London. 

I explore all aspects of the airport, lounge and flight experience; a comprehensive tour of the new Business Class seat and cabin. 

This aircraft will be a game-changer for passengers heading to the Far East from Europe. Finnair offers a brilliant connection experience at Helsinki-Vantaa. 

Leave me a comment in the box below! And subscribe!
